title: BackBox 4.3 i386, [Iso - MultiLang]  [TNTVillage]
description:
BackBox 4.3 i386, [Iso - MultiLang]  [TNTVillage] 

Release originale: [url]http://forum.tntvillage.scambioetico.org/index.php?showtopic=469703[/url]

-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.
BackBox is an Ubuntu-based Linux distribution penetration test and security assessment oriented providing a network and informatic systems analysis toolkit. BackBox desktop environment includes a complete set of tools required for ethical hacking and security testing.
BackBox Linux categories listed as follow:

    Information Gathering
    Vulnerability Assessment
    Exploitation
    Privilege Escalation
    Maintaining Access
    Documentation & Reporting
    Reverse Engineering
    Social Engineering
    Forensic Analysis
    VoIP Analysis
    Wireless Analysis
    Miscellaneous

More than 70 tools are included in BackBox:

    Metasploit/Armitage
    Nmap
    BeEF
    OpenVAS
    W3af
    The Social Engineering Toolkit
    Ettercap
    Scapy
    Wireshark
    Kismet
    Aircrack
    Ophcrack
    Sqlmap
    Crunch
    Reaver
    John The Ripper

:::->Dati<-:::
